name: Mega Man 15: The Robot Apocalypse
summary:
This game was made to celebrate Mega Man's franchise and delve deep into its rich history and legacy. This is a turn-based RPG with a lot of difficulty options so even if you don't like turn-based, you can just breeze through its rich new story!

Here you control four heroes who are fated to fight against a evil scientist named Doctor Wily and his evil robots that are destroying the city and breaking Space-Time itself!

Fight iconic enemies, bosses, find many easter eggs, collect mysterious items and uncover new events that connects different timelines.
